channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: Update Sinking Boat; INC#1512; 08:40PM; 1001 S Seaside Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3SWDzfG; #SanPedro; Firefighters from LAFD Boats used pumps to eject water from the vessel and successfully keep it afloat. Crews towed the vessel to dock, where they can safely address the problem with the vessel. No reported injuries. Nothing further.; FS 111; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC6 BT1 BT2 BT5 E238 E36 E40 T38; CH7; 12; Nicholas Prange

Sinking Vessel; INC#1512; 07:39PM; 1001 S Seaside Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3SWDzfG; #SanPedro; LAFD Fire Boats responded to an approximately 30- to 40-foot vessel that is taking on water at or near the Los Angeles Harbor. Crews are setting up pumps to assist with dewatering to help keep the vessel afloat.; FS 111; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC6 BT1 BT2 BT5 E238 E36 E40 T38; CH7; 12; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire - Now Out; INC#0908; 01:30PM; 1304 E 107th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/4c00LlU; #Watts; Firefighters responded to reports of a "back house" filled with smoke. Crews found fire inside of a converted garage to the rear of a single-family residential property. The first 18 firefighters extinguished the flames in 12 minutes. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 65; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC1 BC13 BC4 E21 E221 E233 E264 E64 E65 RA65 RA865 SQ21 T21 T33 T64; CH9; 12; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0412; 08:51AM; 2706 W Wilshire Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/48LHWRh; #Westlake; Firefighters found a boarded-up two-story commercial building with smoke showing, and the site of a previous fire. Crews made entry and found a rubbish fire on the second floor (contents only), and extinguished the flames before the structure became involved. The first 18 firefighters handled the fire in 17 minutes. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 11; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC1 BC11 E11 E211 E229 E29 E3 EM11 RA11 RA13 RA811 SO1 T11 T20 T29; CH7; 13 14; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#0412; 08:34AM; 2706 W Wilshire Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/48LHWRh; #Westlake; PRELIM: Two-story boarded-up commercial building with smoke showing. Offensive mode.; FS 11; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC1 BC11 E11 E211 E229 E29 E3 RA11 RA811 T11 T20 T29; CH9; 13; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0830; 12:34PM; 5201 S Normandie Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/49YfuMh; #VermontSquare; Firefighters responded to a one-story garage with smoke showing. Firefighters discovered two cars on fire inside the garage. Hose lines were quickly deployed and extinguishment took place. There was one exposure which was extinguished quickly from units in the alley. 26 Firefighters took 10 minutes to put the fire out. No injuries reported and fire is under investigation. ; FS 66; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC11 BC13 E15 E215 E233 E266 E46 E66 RA15 RA33 SQ21 T15 T33 T66; CH9; 12; Krishan Vadukul

Structure Fire; INC#0830; 12:23PM; 5201 S Normandie Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/49YfuMh; Vermont Square; One story detached garage in the rear of the address with heavy smoke.; FS 66; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC11 BC13 E15 E215 E233 E266 E46 RA15 RA33 SQ21 T15 T33 T66; CH9; 12; Krishan Vadukul

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0717; 11:46AM; 10608 N Marklein Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3wM71xm; #MissionHills; Firefighters responded to a one story home threatened by an outside fire. Crews quickly deployed hose lines to minimize any involvement inside. Ultimately it took 26 firefighters 17 minutes to access, confine, and extinguish the flames. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation. ; FS 75; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC10 BC15 E18 E275 E298 E7 E87 RA18 RA87 T75 T98; CH9; 17; Krishan Vadukul

Structure Fire; INC#0717; 11:29AM; 10601 N Marklein Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3uKUppW; Mission Hills; Outside fire exposing a one story single family home.; FS 75; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC10 BC15 E18 E275 E298 E7 E87 RA18 RA87 T75 T98; CH9; 17; Krishan Vadukul

Traffic Collision with Fire; INC#1579; 10:58PM; EB 134 Fwy x Riverside Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3STHD00; #GriffithPark; PRELIM: One passenger vehicle fell from the Riverside Drive (sometimes referenced as Victory Boulevard) freeway overpass, striking the concrete center divider of the Ventura Freeway (SR134) below, and catching fire. Two patients from that vehicle self-extricated prior to the fire department's arrival: A 65 year-old male and a 60 year-old male (unknown affiliation) with unspecified injuries, who were taken by paramedics to regional trauma centers in serious but stable condition. No other injuries reported. Firefighters remain at scene to control the stubborn flames of the still burning vehicle. No escalating or off-site hazard has been identified. Media Inquiries: CHP Altadena (Log #2867), LAPD Central Traffic Division (Incident #4856) and Caltrans.; FS 76; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; BC5 E235 E260 E35 E56 E60 E76 EM5 HR3 RA35 RA56 RA86 SQ21 T35 T60 UR88; CH7; 12; Brian Humphrey
